about_the_game:
Get fresh new looks for each of the writers, with the Author Outfits DLC Pack. Including redesigned sprites, portraits, and animations, this visual makeover will add new life and new style to your second (or twenty-second) playthrough of Sometimes Always Monsters.

(Tropical) Big Deal

Everyone's favourite stoner gets next-level relaxed with this chill tropical ensemble.

Mellow out with some sweet island vibes and enjoy the vibrant color medley.

(Nice Guy) Hung Chan

Ladies, brace yourselves for the most irresistable rendition of our smartest author.

Complete with stylish fedora, and a dashing pencil stache, you'll be forgiven for swooning.

(Spiritualist) Pablo

Close your eyes, take a deep breath, and let that inner voice guide you.

Focus on the patterns, connect with your inner spirit, and find real tranquility.

(Trackstar) DeMarcus

The official uniform of sport and street, in a vibrant shade of red.

DeMarcus pops off at the party in this clasically inspired track suit.

(Mindfreaker) Hassan

When you're ready to have your mind completely blown, call the Mindfreaker.

This complex goth ensemble intersects military might and heavy guyliner.

(Eccentric) Ruth

Whoever said retirement needs to be boring was very wrong.

It's much better to spend the twilight years kitted in wild fashions.

(Business) Trisha

When it's time for business, always aim to knock them dead.

This low-cut power blazer grabs attention and does not let go.

(Hypebeast) Alexa

Young money brings the brands, brings the swag, brings the lifestyle.

Don't hate, just because you're still shopping the clearance rack.

(Bohemian) Sheena

Sending waves of peace and love to all you beautiful people.

This relaxed fit promotes your inner flower child, even when you don't.

(Sakura) Yasi

Feel the bloom of spring with this cherry blossom inspired outfit.

Enjoy this elegant pink and white aesthetic that breathes new life.
